languages.text: {n}Арлекин в своем репертуаре — после его ответа у вас появляется лишь больше вопросов, которые столь же бессмысленно задавать, как и предыдущий.{/n}
{n}The Harlequin is being his usual self. His answer only leaves you with more questions that are just as pointless to ask as the previous one.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Арлекин в своем репертуаре — после его ответа у вас появляется лишь больше вопросов, которые столь же бессмысленно задавать, как и предыдущий.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The Harlequin is being his usual self. His answer only leaves you with more questions that are just as pointless to ask as the previous one.{/n}
{n}The Harlequin is being his usual self. His answer only leaves you with more questions that are just as pointless to ask as the previous one.{/n}
{n}The Harlequin is being his usual self. His answer only leaves you with more questions that are just as pointless to ask as the previous one.{/n}
{n}The Harlequin is being his usual self. His answer only leaves you with more questions that are just as pointless to ask as the previous one.{/n}
{n}The Harlequin is being his usual self. His answer only leaves you with more questions that are just as pointless to ask as the previous one.{/n}
{n}The Harlequin is being his usual self. His answer only leaves you with more questions that are just as pointless to ask as the previous one.{/n}

languages.text: {n}El arlequín se muestra inescrutable, como de costumbre. Su respuesta te plantea más interrogantes, y sería igual de fútil pedirle que te los esclarezca.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Harlequin is being his usual self. His answer only leaves you with more questions that are just as pointless to ask as the previous one.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El arlequín se muestra inescrutable, como de costumbre. Su respuesta te plantea más interrogantes, y sería igual de fútil pedirle que te los esclarezca.{/n}

languages.text: {n}这个丑角依旧是老样子。他的回答只会给你留下更多的问题，而这些问题和之前的问题一样毫无意义。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Harlequin is being his usual self. His answer only leaves you with more questions that are just as pointless to ask as the previous one.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}这个丑角依旧是老样子。他的回答只会给你留下更多的问题，而这些问题和之前的问题一样毫无意义。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Comme d'habitude, au lieu de vous donner de véritables réponses, l'Arlequin ne fait que soulever de nouvelles questions qu'il serait tout aussi inutile de poser.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Harlequin is being his usual self. His answer only leaves you with more questions that are just as pointless to ask as the previous one.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Comme d'habitude, au lieu de vous donner de véritables réponses, l'arlequin ne fait que soulever de nouvelles questions qu'il serait tout aussi inutile de poser.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ハーレクィンは、いつも通りだ。彼の答えは、前の質問と同じように無意味な疑問をさらに残すだけだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Harlequin is being his usual self. His answer only leaves you with more questions that are just as pointless to ask as the previous one.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ハーレクィンは、いつも通りだ。彼の答えは、前の質問と同じように無意味な疑問をさらに残すだけだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der Harlekin ist wie immer. Seine Antwort löst nur weitere Fragen aus, die zu stellen ebenso sinnlos wäre wie es bei der letzten der Fall war.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Harlequin is being his usual self. His answer only leaves you with more questions that are just as pointless to ask as the previous one.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Harlekin ist wie immer. Seine Antwort löst nur weitere Fragen aus, die zu stellen ebenso sinnlos wäre wie es bei der letzten der Fall war.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Arleken, her zamanki hâlinde. Cevabı kafanda daha fazla soru oluşmasına neden olsa da bu soruları sormak, tıpkı bir önceki soruda olduğu gibi anlamsız.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Harlequin is being his usual self. His answer only leaves you with more questions that are just as pointless to ask as the previous one.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Arleken, her zamanki hâlinde. Cevabı, kafanda daha fazla soru oluşmasına neden olsa da bu soruları sormak, tıpkı bir önceki soru gibi anlamsız.{/n}
